body.p: Your petitioner would humbly represent that he has been fined Fifty dollars for carrying concealed and deadly weapons, by the city court of Frankfort, Your petitioner confesses that he did carry concealed a deadly weapon as charged in the warrant but in mitigation would state that he took the same from a friend for fear that said friend would do harm with the same and ^did^ not have the same for any evil or unlawful purpose -- Therefore he prays that Your Excellency will remit all or such part of the above mentioned fine as you may deem proper

Your peitioner ever prays &c &c (over)
Thos W Hughes
The undersigned join in the prayer of the petitioner and think the same a case for Executive clemency

Frankfort City Ct
vs
Thos W. Hughes
$50,
Concealed Weapons
Remit 23 Oct /65
